message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,000,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  However, the value of this product is truly exceptional and I can't let it go for less than $925,000.  I'm confident you'll see a significant return on this investment.
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $850,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875,000. Can you consider this compromise?
